title: shri gaNEsha charaNam
sahitya:
sri ganEsha charaNam gajAnana



devar munivar paNiyum dayakara







anupallavi







nAga bharaNane naanmarai potrum



naamane praNava roopane (jaya)



(shree)







caraNam







paadam nambum rAmadAsa varadane



modaka priyane gowri suthane



aadi devan aruL illaye



vedanum maanum sri thozhilundo



(shree)
